::Spears:;

In a more serious tone, "Well, the whole of Teletran was blown to the 
matrix.  Only the core remains intact.  It's in it's core case.  But 
everything else was totally destroyed.  When those preds hit, they 
hit hard."  She looked around the room with a bit of depression 
showing on her face.  "And it will take matrix knows how long to 
repair.  Shadow Wing was fixing it and had it partially up and 
running when they came back and totalled the room."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker blinks a few times, getting over the surprise of her 
kissing him. He 
> opens his mouth to say something, then closes it after a few 
moments.
> 
> "So," he finally says, trying not to make himself look like an 
idiot, "What's 
> the status here?"
> 
> He glances at the melted console behind Spears, knowing that it was 
a stupid 
> question, but it was probably the best conversation he could make 
at that 
> point.
